item.title: a tiny life in the east side
item.description: A zine-shape assembled from the comics I drew on a small climbing/work trip to the east side with marco \o/ (zine format is not simple to print or read. to recieve a copy, you can email/message me and I’ll send you a physically assembled one.) Here’s a preview of the cover:

item.title: Vanna Cafe
item.description: A branding project for the crag-side pop-up cafe that marco’s van sometimes transforms into a cafe if the moment arises \o/
